Full Stack Development.Description: Versatile Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in designing, developing, and optimizing scalable web applications across front-end and back-end technologies. Skilled in building robust software solutions, modernizing applications, and collaborating with teams to deliver high-quality, user-centric products.

Application Architecture.Description: Seasoned Application Architect with a strong background in designing scalable, high-performance systems and modernizing applications for cloud-native environments. Skilled in defining architectural best practices, optimizing software delivery, and collaborating with diverse teams to align technical solutions with business goals.

Engineering Management.Description: Experienced software engineering leader with a proven ability to build and lead high-performing teams while driving successful project delivery. Skilled in collaborating with cross-functional teams, hiring and mentoring engineers, and aligning technical execution with business objectives while prioritizing ROI.

timeline.description: Led three engineering teams in architecting, developing and deploying a scalable, cloud-native data transformation platform on AWS, enhancing system reliability and performance.
Designed and developed enterprise-scale, data-intensive full-stack applications, optimizing performance across multi-cloud environments.
Developed and optimized data-driven healthcare applications, enhancing performance, scalability, and analytics in a cloud-based environment.
Earned an MBA, gaining expertise in business strategy, leadership, and technology management to drive innovation and align engineering solutions with business goals.
Developed critical software modules for Citi Bankâ€™s global systems, enhancing performance and reliability while mentoring new recruits and ensuring code quality in an Agile environment.
Earned a degree in Computer Science Engineering, building a strong foundation in software development, algorithms, and system design.
